//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DNESpecularAttenuation;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float4x4 ScreenToShadowMatrix;
//   float4 ShadowBufferAndTexelSize;
//   sampler2D ShadowDepthTexture;
//   float ShadowOverrideFactor;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float3 UpperSkyColor;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   DNESpecularAttenuation       c0       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   ScreenToShadowMatrix         c7       4
//   DNEResolution                c11      1
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c12      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c13      1
//   ShadowBufferAndTexelSize     c14      1
//   ShadowOverrideFactor         c15      1
//   UpperSkyColor                c16      1
//   AmbientColorAndSkyFactor     c17      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture           s1       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0.5, 0, 0.200000003
    dcl_texcoord3 v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord4 v1
    dcl_texcoord6 v2.w
    dcl_texcoord5 v3.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13

    dp3_pp r0.x, v0, v0
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, v0.z
    mov r1.xyz, c4
    mul r0.yzw, r1.xxyz, c16.xxyz
    mov_pp r1.w, c17.w
    mad_pp r0.yzw, r0, r1.w, c12.xxyz
    texld_pp r2, c1, s0
    if b0
      mad r2.yz, vPos.xxyw, c11.xxyw, c11.xzww
      mul r2.yz, r2, v3.w
      mul r3, r2.z, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_CFE71B15_0.txt
add r8.w, v2.w, -r8.y
mad r2.y, -r8.w, r8.x, r2.y

      mad r3, c7, r2.y, r3
      mad r3, c9, v2.w, r3
      mad r3, c10, v3.w, r3
      rcp r1.w, r3.w
      mul r2.yz, r1.w, r3.xxyw
      texld r4, r2.yzzw, s1
      mov r5.xz, c1
      mad r5, c14.wwzw, r5.zxxz, r2.yzyz
      texld r6, r5, s1
      texld r5, r5.zwzw, s1
      mad r3.xy, r3, r1.w, c14.zwzw
      texld r7, r3, s1
      mov r4.y, r6.x
      mov r4.z, r5.x
      mov r4.w, r7.x
      add r3, r3.z, -r4
      cmp r4, r3, c1.z, c1.x
      mul r2.yz, r2, c14.xxyw
      frc r2.yz, r2
      cmp r3.xy, r3, -c1.z, -c1.x
      add r3.xy, r3, r4.zwzw
      mad r2.yw, r2.y, r3.xxzy, r4.xxzy
      lrp r1.w, r2.z, r2.w, r2.y
      mul r1.w, r1.w, c15.x
      mul_pp r2.x, r1.w, r2.x
    endif
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, c0.w
    mul_pp r2.yzw, r0.x, c4.xxyz
    mul_pp r2.xyz, r2.x, r2.yzww
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r2, c13, r0.yzww
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r1, c17, r0
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r0, v1.w, v1
    mov_pp oC0.w, c1.w

// approximately 47 instruction slots used (5 texture, 42 arithmetic)
